headline.main: Astros Hit 3 HRs to Beat Mariners 4-3 for 8th Straight Win
headline.print_headline: Astros Hit 3 HRs to Beat Mariners 4-3 for 8th Straight Win

docs.snippet: Evan Gattis, Jake Marisnick and George Springer all homered to lead the Houston Astros to a 4-3 victory over the Seattle Mariners on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Evan Gattis, Jake Marisnick and George Springer all homered to lead the Houston Astros to a 4-3 victory over the Seattle Mariners on Friday night.

headline.main: Mayoral Candidate Slain in Mexico's Troubled Guerrero State
headline.print_headline: Mayoral Candidate Slain in Mexico's Troubled Guerrero State

docs.snippet: The legislature in the southern Mexican state of Guerrero has condemned the killing of a local mayoral candidate....
docs.lead_paragraph: The legislature in the southern Mexican state of Guerrero has condemned the killing of a local mayoral candidate.

headline.main: Kucherov Scores in 2OT, Lightning Beat Canadiens
headline.print_headline: Kucherov Scores in 2OT, Lightning Beat Canadiens

docs.snippet: Nikita Kucherov scored at 2:06 of the second overtime to give the Tampa Bay Lightning a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadians on Friday night in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference semifinal series....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nikita Kucherov scored at 2:06 of the second overtime to give the Tampa Bay Lightning a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadians on Friday night in Game 1 of the Eastern Conference semifinal series.

headline.main: Young Throws 5 No-Hit Innings in Royals' 4-1 Win Over Tigers
headline.print_headline: Young Throws 5 No-Hit Innings in Royals' 4-1 Win Over Tigers

docs.snippet: Chris Young pitched five no-hit innings and the Detroit Tigers didn't break through until the eighth in a 4-1 loss Friday night to the Kansas City Royals...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Young pitched five no-hit innings and the Detroit Tigers didn't break through until the eighth in a 4-1 loss Friday night to the Kansas City Royals

docs.snippet: Rory McIlroy kept some star power in the Match Play Championship on Friday by winning the last two holes with birdies to force overtime and then beating old foe Billy Horschel on the second extra hole to make it to the weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy kept some star power in the Match Play Championship on Friday by winning the last two holes with birdies to force overtime and then beating old foe Billy Horschel on the second extra hole to make it to the weekend.

headline.main: Gibson Pitches 8 Strong Innings, Twins Beat White Sox 1-0
headline.print_headline: Gibson Pitches 8 Strong Innings, Twins Beat White Sox 1-0

docs.snippet: Kyle Gibson pitched eight strong innings and the Minnesota Twins scored on a wild pitch to beat the Chicago White Sox 1-0 Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kyle Gibson pitched eight strong innings and the Minnesota Twins scored on a wild pitch to beat the Chicago White Sox 1-0 Friday night.

headline.main: Cowboys' Hardy Criticized on Twitter Over 9/11-Related Joke
headline.print_headline: Cowboys' Hardy Criticized on Twitter Over 9/11-Related Joke

docs.snippet: Dallas defensive end Greg Hardy, who is facing a 10-game suspension for his role in a domestic violence case, stirred criticism Friday night with a joking reference on Twitter to the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dallas defensive end Greg Hardy, who is facing a 10-game suspension for his role in a domestic violence case, stirred criticism Friday night with a joking reference on Twitter to the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks.

headline.main: Pete Brown, First Black Player to Win PGA Tour Event, Dies
headline.print_headline: Pete Brown, First Black Player to Win PGA Tour Event, Dies

docs.snippet: Pete Brown, the first black player to win a PGA Tour event, died Friday. He was 80....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pete Brown, the first black player to win a PGA Tour event, died Friday. He was 80.

headline.main: Canadian Henderson Leads by One at Texas Shootout
headline.print_headline: Canadian Henderson Leads by One at Texas Shootout

docs.snippet: Canadian Brooke Henderson seized her second consecutive 36-hole lead after shooting a six-under 65 at the LPGA North Texas Shootout on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Canadian Brooke Henderson seized her second consecutive 36-hole lead after shooting a six-under 65 at the LPGA North Texas Shootout on Friday.

headline.main: Kerry Travels to Sri Lanka to Cheer on Democratic Reforms
headline.print_headline: Kerry Travels to Sri Lanka to Cheer on Democratic Reforms

docs.snippet: John Kerry is making the first visit to Sri Lanka by a U.S. secretary of state in a decade, seizing a rare opportunity to champion democratic reform and to tighten ties at a strategic crossroads in the vast Indian Ocean....
docs.lead_paragraph: John Kerry is making the first visit to Sri Lanka by a U.S. secretary of state in a decade, seizing a rare opportunity to champion democratic reform and to tighten ties at a strategic crossroads in the vast Indian Ocean.
